text: Vasily Vasiliyevich Reshetnikov () (born December 23, 1919 died March 20, 2023) was a Soviet pilot during World War II. Reshetnikov flew 307 missions mainly as a pilot for a long-range bomber and in the summer of 1943. He was honored with Hero of the Soviet Union. He was Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Air Force of the Soviet Union from 1980 to 1986. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Soviet military personnel of World War II
title: Vasily Reshetnikov
